mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id, A.sale_ym, A.cat_id, A.menu_id, A.sale_quantity, B.menu_cost, B.menu_nm FROM SALES A INNER JOIN MENUS B ON A.menu_id = B.menu_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.sale_ym = #{saleYm} AND A.cat_id = #{catId} ORDER BY B.menu_cost DESC LIMIT #{size}
SELECT cat_nm FROM CATEGORY WHERE cat_id = #{catId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (cat_id, user_id, cat_nm, sale_ym, reg_dt) VALUES (#{catId},#{userId},#{catNm},#{saleYm},NOW())

INSERT INTO SALES (user_id, sale_ym, cat_id, menu_id, sale_quantity, menu_cost, menu_nm, popularity, contribution_margin, menu_engine_cd, reg_dt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{saleYm}, #{catId}, #{menuId}, #{saleQuantity}, #{menuCost}, #{menuNm}, #{popularity}, #{contributionMargin}, #{menuEngineCd}, NOW())
